Sencha CMD 3.1.242
Architect 2.2

- Run in simulator
sencha  app package run packager.iphone.simulator.json 

- Create native app

sencha app build native ( packager.json has to be there)

- Create production build

sencha app build  --destination  /Users/sudhir/Projects/trials/tortlets/src/main/webapp/phone production

-- Confusing problems for ad hoc profile

sencha app package build -p ./packager.json
sencha app build native
Then go to ../dist/Payload and run zip command
zip -r -q Tortlets.ipa zipfile Payload
( This build creates big app file need to have clean up script later)
